title: American Horror Story: Season 8 - Sept. 12 on FX
author: American Horror Story Brasil
comment: So finally the crossover of Coven and Murder House. Hopefully the "horror" factor is redeemed. Just wanna see Jessica Lange again. AHS coven and murder house incomplete without her
Taissa farmiga better be on this season
Ryan said "all the witches are being called back" and Sarah said she likes the script. I'm looking forward to seeing Taissa.
description:
Foi confirmado por Ryan Murphy que a oitava temporada de American Horror Story será um crossover entre as temporadas Murder House e Coven. Preparamos um teaser só para dar um gostinho do que está por vir. :) 

We don't own the rights to songs and videos presented. All the rights belong to the owner of the song, 20th Century Fox Television and FX Networks. We're not profiting by publishing. 

Siga-nos nas redes sociais!
